alert.note: Alert for Montour; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton; Southern Lycoming; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 6:34PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHUMBERLAND...EAST CENTRAL CENTRE...NORTHEASTERN JUNIATA...SNYDER...MONTOUR...SOUTHEASTERN LYCOMING...UNION AND SOUTHEASTERN CLINTON COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM EDT... At 634 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southeast of Jersey Shore to Mifflinburg to 18 miles southwest of Selinsgrove. Movement was east northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Sunbury, Milton, Lewisburg, Selinsgrove, Danville, Montoursville, Northumberland, Mifflinburg, Carroll, Winfield, Muncy, Watsontown, Elysburg, Fairview-Ferndale, Hughesville, Riverside, Trevorton, Shamokin Dam, Montgomery and Linntown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Montour; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton; Southern Lycoming; Union
